version_description:
Fix some bugs that were reported around the card draw simulator.
Include weaknesses + story cards in the edit view for decks, instead of behind a toggle.

- You can choose to view translated card text in the Settings menu. The full app isn't translated, but most card names and game text will be.
- Fix a bug around deck edits not syncing when search screen is dismissed.
- General bug fixes and improvements.
Add support for newest released cards, including a quick fix for a crash if new cards were added to a deck on the website.

• Current deck now appears at top of edit mode, making it easier to adjust cards in the deck.
• Spanish language translation of the app, if you'd like to help translate the app into German/Italian/French please contact me at arkhamcards@gmail.com.
• General bug fixes and improvements.

Quick fix for crash when filtering by pack/cycle name with non-English cards.
If you are interested in helping to translate the app into Italian/German, please contact arkhamcards@gmail.com

• Improve speed of deck builder, UI should be much more responsive now.
• German translation of In Too Deep
• Continued work on French translations, including more of The Circle Undone and Return to Dunwich Legacy.

• New design for decks.
• Continued work on French translations, Path to Carosa is now completed.
- Fix an issue related to backup files and campaign data.
- Some speed improvements while editing decks.

• Add support for standalone scenarios (accessible when creating a new campaign).
• Fix collections during deckbuilding for investigator starter deck reprints.

• Add support for standalone scenarios (accessible when creating a new campaign).
• Fix collections during deckbuilding for investigator starter deck reprints.
• Add some requested new search filters for cards.
• Add scenario guide for Devil Reef.

• Add scenario guide for new War of the Outer Gods side scenario, which can be played in either campaign mode or as a standalone.
• Continued work on the French campaign guides, including the full Dream-Eaters campaign.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

• Add scenario guide for the Bad Blood downloadable scenario and parallel Agnes.
• Fix for War of the Outer Gods resolutions, including fixing some bonus XP.
• Add standalone scenario guide for the Meddling of Meowlathotep scenario from Barkham Horror.

• New look and feel for editing and upgrading decks.
• Fix some missing instructions + incorrect resolutions for War of the Outer Gods scenario.
• Add ability to assign random basic weaknesses when starting a standalone scenario.

• Add ability to view and edit the 'Notes' that are shared with ArkhamDB.
• Add support for tracking achievements that come with the Return campaigns.
